resources.string:
Janjira Sea Food was started by Mr. Vilas Chorge in 1996. You can be sure at Janjira. The Food you will Eat will be fit for a janjira king. 

 Our special receipies unique to janjira. We have been perfected by our chef. And have originated in the kitchen of Sea Food Emperors. At Janjira It is our food ingredient all item is branded. 
 Guest Satisfaction is our aim.

150 grams serving of fish can provide 50% - 60% daily protein needs. 

 All Seafood are low in fat. 

 Majority of fishes are low in cholesterol 

 Having of seafood reduces heart diseases 

 Fish are high in minerals, ioding and selenium which keeps the body running smoothly 

 Seafood is good for brain development 

 Fish also contains Vitamin A which is good for skin and eyes.
Welcome to \n Janjira Sea Food Resto and Bar
We are Janjira Sea Food Resto,always best in taste. \n\nWe serve yummy, tasty food to add crunchiness in your life.
जंजिरा सी फूड मध्ये तुमचे स्वागत आहे.
